paper_abstract: SONIC MILLIP3DE, A SYSTEM ARCHITECTURE AND ACCELERATOR FOR 3D ULTRASOUND BEAMFORMING, HAS A THREE-LAYER DIE-STACKED DESIGN THAT COMBINES A HARDWARE-FRIENDLY APPROACH TO THE ULTRASOUND IMAGING ALGORITHM WITH A CUSTOM BEAMFORMING ACCELERATOR. THE SYSTEM ACHIEVES HIGH-QUALITY 3D ULTRASOUND IMAGING WITHIN A FULL-SYSTEM POWER OF 15 W IN 45-NM SEMICONDUCTOR TECHNOLOGY. SONIC MILLIP3DE IS PROJECTED TO ACHIEVE THE TARGET 5-W POWER BUDGET BY THE 16-NM TECHNOLOGY NODE.
paper_title: SONIC MILLIP3DE: AN ARCHITECTURE FOR HANDHELD 3D ULTRASOUND
